chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! I'm the navigator. Please give me instructions on which way to go on the map.
Where are you located on the map?
I am currently at the starting point of the map.
okay well you want to go past the tiger
Got it! I will go past the tiger. Which direction should I head after passing the tiger?
cross the bridge to where the blue bird is
Understood! I will cross the bridge to where the blue bird is. Anything else I should be aware of in terms of direction or landmarks?

The bridge is a small log once you cross it you will be on an island with a blue bird and an elephant. circle around the bird and go across the bridge made out of rocks to get to the island with the green frog on it

Great! I will cross the small log bridge to reach the island with the blue bird and elephant. Then, I will circle around the bird and head across the bridge made of rocks to reach the island with the green frog. 

Once I reach the frog, which direction should I go?
you want to make a left and cross over the alligators back to reach the next island

Thank you for the instruction! I will make a left from the green frog and cross over the alligator's back to reach the next island. 

After crossing the alligator, which direction should I go?
once you're on the island next to the elephant go over the grey rocks to get to the island with the giraffe

Got it! I will head over the grey rocks from the island next to the elephant to reach the island with the giraffe. 

Once I'm on the giraffe island, where should I go next?
cross the bridge and go past the snake to get the treasure!

Perfect! I will cross the bridge and go past the snake to reach the treasure. 

*Finished!* I have successfully reached the treasure. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hey

Hello! Are you ready to start the game? Let's begin with Step 1. 

Please take a few steps to your left (west) and describe what you see.
I see a road
Great! Keep going west and let me know what you see next.
I see a stream of water
Good job! Now, just near the stream, you should see a wooden branch crossing a river. Please cross over the branch and head south. Let me know when you've reached the next landmark.
I don't see a wooden branch

I apologize for the confusion. Let's go back a bit. From the stream, go back east until you see a wooden branch crossing the river. Cross over the branch and head south from there. Let me know once you find it.
I see a picnic area

Almost there! Please continue south from the picnic area and look for a mat with a bowl of berries on it. Once you find it, make sure to touch the bowl of berries before moving on. Let me know when you've done that.
I have touched the berries

Excellent! Now, continue west from the berries and look for another wooden branch that crosses the river. Once you find it, cross over the branch to the north. Let me know once you've crossed the river.
I crossed the river

Great job! Now, instead of going straight, we're going to circle around a green bush. Starting from where you are, go to the right (east) of the bush until you reach a florist stand. Let me know when you've reached the florist stand.
I am at the florist stand
Fantastic! Now, turn left (west) and go below the florist stand. You should see a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Pass the bridge to the west. Let me know once you've crossed the bridge.
I have crossed the bridge

Great progress! Just after the bridge, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Walk a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch. Let me know when you've reached the next landmark.
I have arrived at the landmark
Wonderful! Now, from where you are, head east between the wooden branch and the green bush. Let me know when you've moved in that direction.
I have moved

Great! Finally, a few steps to the east, you should come across a brown young deer. Congratulations, you've reached the final objective! Well done! How does it feel to have successfully followed the path?
It feels really good. Thanks for all your help!

You're welcome! I'm glad I could help you navigate the path. Great job following the instructions, and I'm glad you enjoyed the game. If you ever want to play again or need assistance with anything else, feel free to ask. Have a fantastic day!
You too!
Thank you! Goodbye and take care!
Goodbye!
Goodbye!

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello
Hello! I am the navigator. Please give me your instructions on how to proceed on the map. What do you see around you?
What do you see around you?

From my location at the starting point, I see a tent to the north of me. To the south of the tent, there is a dog sitting to the left of a fire. To the right of the fire, there is a red mushroom. And further south, there is a blue car. What should I do next?
start moving south
Understood. I am currently moving south from the starting point. I have passed by the dog, fire, and red mushroom. Now I see a blue car to the south of me. What is my next move?
Keep going south of the blue car until you reach the telescope
Got it. I am continuing south from the blue car. Now I see a blue telescope in front of me. What is my next move?
you want to head left and climb up the rocks to reach the cabin
let me know when you are there

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Are you ready to navigate through the map? Let's get started! Can you please describe where you are and what you see around you?
I can see a map of a beach with a dog tent speakers sharks crabs rocks and a canoe. Where are you at?

I'm glad you can see the map! I am your instructor, guiding you through the path. Right now, you are at the top part of the map, near a group of three palm trees. Can you see those trees? Let me know when you're ready to begin.
yes I am ready

Great! Let's start.

Step 1: Move under the first palm tree to the south-west. Then, turn right and cross the second palm tree. After that, make a sharp left turn before the third palm tree and continue southward. Let me know when you have reached this point.
I am there

Fantastic! Now, for Step 2: Move to the left of a brown puppy. Then, slightly turn left and proceed to the right, heading towards the south. Take your time and let me know when you have completed this step.
I have done this

Wonderful! Now, for Step 3: The path will take you between a big rock on the west and a small rock on the east. Keep moving and you will reach the ocean or another body of water. Let me know when you have arrived at the water's edge.
I am here

Excellent! Step 4: Enter the water and face a large red crab. After that, turn right (west) and continue along the big rock in the water. Take your time and let me know when you have completed this step.
I have done this
Great job! Step 5: After going along the big rock, you will encounter a shark in the water. Make a sharp turn to the right and continue in that direction. Let me know when you have made the turn.
I turned to the right of the shark

Perfect! Step 6: Now, go back to the land and cross between a medium rock and a blue-yellow-white ball. Once you've done that, continue heading north. Let me know when you have reached the other side.
I am here

Awesome job! Step 7: Veer slightly left and proceed to the north-west, making sure to cross between a red tent on the left and a larger speaker on the right. Keep going and let me know when you have passed through.
I passed through

Fantastic! Step 8: Now, circle around the red tent in an arc, and then continue south towards the sea. As you reach the shore, turn right (west) and go below a red kayak. Once you're there, let me know.
im here

Excellent progress! You're almost there. Step 9: Turn 90 degrees to the right (north) and move along the kayak. Keep going until you reach a small green bush. That's your final objective. Let me know when you have arrived at the small green bush.
okay im here

Congratulations! You have successfully reached your final objective at the small green bush. Well done! You navigated through the map like a pro. I hope you enjoyed the journey. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I think it's kind of cool and a unique way of communicating
